title: Web-Designer & Full-stack Developer âš¡âš¡
basic_info.description_1: I'm Sebastien :) I'm a full-stack developper and I love to work with newest front-end frameworks like React and Next.js to make Internet a better place, with the best possible user experience.
basic_info.description_2: Welcome to my portfolio, where you can discover my web development and design work.
basic_info.description_3: I would be delighted to help you with your web project, optimize your SEO and improve your site's performance.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: A project like Airbnb, created using React and Sass, to find and book dreamed vacation accommodations! The goal was to create the front-end part of the website from a given mockup and make it able to dynamically display accommodations using an API that communicates with the backend. It was also necessary to create animations for the Collapse components.

projects.title: Vieux-Grimoire
projects.description: A book rating website with a personal space. The front-end was already done, and the task was to create the back-end of the site and its API to allow users to add, delete, modify, and update books, as well as rate them. Implemented with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for the back-end.

projects.title: Nina Carducci - Photographer
projects.description: One of the first projects I completed independently during my training. The goal was to improve overall performance, SEO, and fix some technical bugs related to modal displays.

projects.title: Booki
projects.description: A simple and responsive landing-page for booking accomodations for a nice city-trip ! Based on a given mockup, the task was to recreate the page interface using HTML & CSS.

experience.title: Bachelor of Philosophy
experience.description: Graduation in Philosophy and Human Sciences
